resources.string: Do your parents know that you are getting Fs in school?
The sun makes up 99.8% of the mass of our solar system
Oxford University in England predates the Aztec Empire
You cannot legally put a satellite dish on the roof of a residential home in Florida.
Some insects in China have acid blood that can burn metal
Most ink used for tattoos is derived from grape juice
If you cut an earthworm in half, both hales can regrow their body
Human can distinguish between over a trillion different smells.
